t:
It had been a decade since I've heard any human voice. So, when I heard a faint ‘Hello’ from across the hall, I rushed towards it.



When I reached the other side of the hall, I shouted another loud ‘Hello’.

As my voice echoed across the hall, I chased after it, giggling all the way.
c:
I'm no longer sure if it's my voice that I keep hearing.



#madness #alone #voice #void #unknown #clueless #pointless #moot
